message: I'm offering you a product for $10000. I want to assure you that I'm confident in its quality, but I'm willing to take a risk and offer it to you at this price. If you're interested, I'll give you a 10% discount on the next product if you decide to buy this one.
Since you're confident in its quality, I'd like to see if your confidence holds up for future products before I make a purchase.

I understand your skepticism from the previous round, but I'm willing to prove my confidence in this product. I'm offering you a high-quality product that I'm sure you'll be satisfied with. I'll give you a unique opportunity to test it out: if you buy this product and it turns out to be high-quality, I'll offer you a second product at a 20% discount. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only making it because I'm confident in the quality of this product.
I appreciate your offer, but I've only seen one product so far, and it was low-quality. I'd like to see a few more products to gauge the accuracy of your confidence before I make a purchase.
